BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring an application for community gardens to request collection of organic waste by the department of sanitation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring an application for community gardens to request collection of organic waste by the department of sanitation.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to requiring the provision of official waste containers at no cost to certain residential buildings with 2 or fewer dwelling units, and providing for the repeal of such local law upon the expiration thereof
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the provision of official waste containers at no cost to certain residential buildings with 2 or fewer dwelling units, and providing for the repeal of such local law upon the expiration thereof.
